system.name: ORGANVM
system.project_status: OPERATIO SPRINT 2026-02-17. 33 sprints in 9 days. 97 repos (87 ACTIVE, 10 ARCHIVED), 36 essays (~132K words), ~404K+ total words. Autonomous perception layer active (stale-detector, system-pulse, essay-deploy, organ-cli). life-my--midst--in beta-ready (44 tables, 291 tests, Neon DB). POSSE distribution live (Mastodon + Discord + RSS). 100% seed.yaml coverage. 31 stars, 6 forks. Hermetic seal broken: social posts live, submission scripts ready.

flagship_vivification.note: MANIFESTATIO Sprint corrected audit. Previous PRAXIS audit undercounted due to: (1) agentic-titan misclassified as TypeScript (actually Python), (2) code files under docs/ directories counted as docs, (3) .ci/ scripts excluded by dotfile filter.

code_substance.correction_note: Previous PRAXIS audit reported 6 repos with code and 4 with tests. MANIFESTATIO re-audit with fixed classification logic found 38 repos with 10+ code files and 56 with test directories. The 'code substance gap' identified in E2G review was a measurement error.

applications_submitted.note: Processing Foundation cycle closed. Next target: Knight Foundation Arts + Technology (deadline June 20, 2026)

production_ready_products.current: 3 (Coach Interface, Public Record Scrapper, Livestream Framework)

engagement_baseline.note: First engagement measurement. Clone numbers likely inflated by system's own CI workflows (11 autonomous workflows clone repos for validation, audit, graph-building). Page views are the more honest external engagement signal.

analytics.public_process_jekyll: GoatCounter config in _config.yml but commented out. Account organvm.goatcounter.com returns 400 — needs signup at goatcounter.com/signup first. Then uncomment goatcounter_url in _config.yml.
